description:
*** webOS Hot Apps Winner ***

2 apps (phone and TouchPad) in one package!

* search in calendar and contacts (most fields)
* see an Agenda of upcoming events 
* dial, send SMS or Email directly from the results list
* search with Just Type (webOS 2.x/3.x)

If you sync your device with Google, then this App provides all these features for you.

Additional features: 
* tap on a found event or contact to go to the day in the calendar or to the detail screen of the contact on your device (contact is phone only)
* partial word search
* filter by calendars & contact groups (categories)
* send search results as Email

Contacts can be sorted and grouped by name, last name, company or zip code. You can even use the power of RegExp for some search types!

This is a much enhanced version of our App "Google Calendar Search". Enhancements include search in contacts, multiple accounts, partial (sub-string) search, Agenda mode and highlighting in results. New in this version: Fullscreen on the Pre3.
